Title: In A First, Pune Scientists Capture Microscopic Image Of The Novel Coronavirus - India Times
Description: Click here to read about the images of the coronavirus have been taken by a team of ICMR-NIV scientists in Pune. The images have been captured using a transmission electron microscope and have been published in the Indian Journal of Medical Research.

Title: Self-medicating with HCQ for COVID-19 dangerous, warn experts - The News Minute

Title: First electron microscope image of coronavirus from India released - WION
Description: The image revealed the presence of stalk-like projections ending in round structures typical of a coronavirus particle.

Title: Italy has yet to hit coronavirus peak, lockdown set to be extended - Reuters India
Description: Italy's recorded 919 deaths from coronavirus on Friday, the highest daily toll anywhere in the world, while the number of confirmed cases eclipsed the total in China where the virus first emerged.

Title: COVID-19 Symptom Tracker App Will Help Curb The Spread Of Coronavirus - Mashable India
Description: British researchers recently launched a new app that tracks symptoms related to Coronavirus, allows users to self-report daily, and identify the ones at risk of the disease, to battle the Coronavirus pandemic
